headline: McDonald's 2026 Menu Shift Tests Growth Story For Valuation-Conscious Investors
summary: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) plans major menu changes in 2026, including a nationwide rollout of new McCafé beverages. The company is introducing energy drink collaborations under the McCafé brand after strong test results. Limited-time promotions such as the McNugget Caviar kit have generated strong viral attention. McDonald's is also adjusting its food offering as more customers adopt GLP-1 weight loss medications. For you as an investor, these updates sit at the heart of what McDonald's does:...
